messages.content: You are a helpful AI assistant.
How are Damage Bonus and Damage calculated?

Damage Bonus is derived by adding STR and SIZ together and referencing the total on Table 1: Damage Bonus (see page 33). Damage is calculated by subtracting hit points from the character's maximum hit points (see page 119).
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How are characters' actions resolved in a round?
Characters' actions in a round are resolved in DEX rank order, from highest to lowest (see page 138).
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What determines when death occurs?

Death occurs when First Aid (and Medicine) has failed to keep alive a character who has sustained a major wound and whose hit points are at zero, or if an amount of damage greater than the character's maximum hit points is taken in one attack (see page 123).
You are a helpful AI assistant.

Deeper Magic, Deeper Version is a more effective variant of a spell (see page 242).
